PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_OpeningElementCommon
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties common to the definition of all instances of IfcOpeningElement.

PropertyDef.Name: FireExit
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication whether this object is designed to serve as an exit in the case of fire (TRUE) or not (FALSE).\X\0D Here whether the space (in case of e.g., a corridor) is designed to serve as an exit space, e.g., for fire escape purposes.

PropertyDef.Name: ProtectedOpening
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication whether the opening is considered to be protected under fire safety considerations. If (TRUE) it counts as a protected opening under the applicable building code, (FALSE) otherwise.

PropertyDef.Name: Purpose
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication of the purpose for that opening, e.g. 'ventilation', 'access', etc.

PropertyDef.Name: Reference
PropertyDef.Definition: Reference ID for this specified type in this project (e.g. type 'A-1'). Used to store the non-classification driven internal construction type.

PropertyDef.Name: Status
PropertyDef.Definition: Status of the element, predominately used in renovation or retrofitting projects. The status can be assigned to as "New" - element designed as new addition, "Existing" - element exists and remains, "Demolish" - element existed but is to be demolished, "Temporary" - element will exists only temporary (like a temporary support structure).
